official_title: A bill extending permission for the President's Commission on White House Fellows to accept certain donations.

summary.text: Authorizes the President's Commission on White House Fellows to accept donations of money, property, and personal services.

titles.title: A bill extending permission for the President's Commission on White House Fellows to accept certain donations.
